resources.string:
I am a software Engineer with experience in mobile development using Java MVP as architecture pattern.


I like challenges and this is what i like the most of being a software developer 

i like to learn and i learn really fast, i like to study new technologies and i like to be update about new practices of mobile development. 

Looking for company who help me to grow as an engineer and as a person, and i want to help the company to grow up with my knowledge and my enthusiasm. 

 Thanks for downloading my app and i hope this was really helpful to you, it was for me :D
